subject: Re: [sugar] Getting sugar running on a Mac
body:
Steven W Riggins wrote:
> Hi all!
>
> I'm having a devlish of a time getting anything running with the  
> current build instructions.  I've downloaded the live CD images, gone  
> through several wiki how-to pages, nothing seems current nor working.
>   
...
> Any clue as to what is the best way to get a image up for developing?
>   
It took Miles about 5 minutes to get up-and-running with the Gentoo 
developer's images (version 2) under the OSX VMWare beta.  I don't 
*think* he ever got networking working, however (he has been able to 
develop a game and started in another with that setup though, I believe 
he uses a USB key to transfer files in/out at the moment).  I would 
imagine the Fedora Core image by Noah might work there as well.

HTH, and let us know what your final solution is, if possible,
Mike
